text: Wa ɠɛ nɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wa-ƓALAGI ɠaazu, naama adaʋɛ, ʋɛ é yeelosu ná ʋa, miná ɠa wa ti mi ná, wa wo-loun zunuiti, ta wo-loun anzanuiti, ta wa-wotiɠɛ zunuiti, ta wa-wotiɠɛ anzanuiti, ta Levi nuiti ti zeini wa-laaiti su, wa ɠoozunɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wa-ƓALAGI ɠaazu, wa-wotii ma lɔnɔgiti kpein su.
